## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:


``` r
remotes::install_github("PaulESantos/snowpack")
```

## Example

data model:

```{r example}
library(snowpack)

data("hobo_rmbl_data")
pbm <- hobo_rmbl_data[[2]]
head(pbm)

```

- File data review

+ `check_ymd()`:

```{r check}
pbm %>% 
  check_ymd(month)
```

+ `start_end_dates()`

```{r start}
pbm %>% 
  start_end_dates()

pbm %>% 
  start_end_dates(month)
```

- Bouild `HOBO snow` object:

+ `hobo_sumamry()`

```{r hobo_sumamry}
pbm %>% 
  hobo_summary()
```

+`snow_pack()`

```{r snow_pack}
pbm %>% 
  hobo_summary() %>% 
  snow_pack("temperature_c_1", range, 5)
```

+ `summary_snow_pack()`

```{r summary_1}
pbm %>% 
   hobo_summary() %>% 
   snow_pack("temperature_c_1", range, 3) %>% 
   summary_snow_pack()
```
